channel.title: Refresh Renovations Offer and Competitions
channel.description: Check out our current competitions and offers. You can get special deals or enter for the chance to win exciting prizes!

item.title: Wrapping up 2023 People’s Choice Awards: Vote for your favourite Renovation of the Year! | Refresh Renovations USA
item.description: Last but certainly not least, we have our Renovation of the Year category! You won’t want to miss these displays of exceptional style, form, and function in homes across the country

item.title: Who won the Refresh $6000 fireplace prize? | Refresh Renovations USA
item.description: Rory Moss was the lucky winner of a $6,000 Fireplace prize package. The Riva 67 adds warmth and character to any room or living space.

item.title: Who won the iPad competition? | Refresh Renovations USA
item.description: As a sign of their appreciation for your feedback, they offered you the chance to win an iPad by reviewing the Australian ad and providing your feedback. Danielle Mahoney was our lucky iPad winner.

item.title: Who won the Rinnai BBQ from Refresh? | Refresh Renovations USA
item.description: Refresh offered you the chance to win a top of the range Rinnai BBQ. Les Fleming of Auckland was the lucky winner of this great prize.

item.title: Who won the playhouse from Refresh? | Refresh Renovations USA
item.description: Melanie Bailey from Auckland was the lucky winner of the playhouse! We hope her kids have a great time with it.

item.title: Who won the MotorEyes™ drive recorder? | Refresh Renovations USA
item.description: Jenny Murray was the lucky winner of the MotorEyes drive recorder from Refresh Renovations.

item.description: Theresa Putt was the winner of our fun renovation competition. This promotion closed on 10 February 2011.

item.description: With 20 of the most dramatic transformations of 2022 to choose from, we need your help picking the most impressive! Vote for your favourite to be entered to win a security camera kit by Eufy.

item.description: The Refresh People’s Choice Awards 2022 are well underway. But with so many incredible designs to choose from we still need your help.

item.title: People's Choice Awards: 2022 Whole House Renovation of the Year | Refresh Renovations USA
item.description: The entries for Whole House Renovation of the Year will make it hard to pick which is best, but for helping us choose a winner you’ll be entered in the competition to win an Apple Watch SE (GPS, 40mm Space Grey Aluminium Case with Midnight Sport Band) valued at $469 NZD!

item.title: 2022 Renovation of the Year: Cast your vote for the People’s Choice Awards! | Refresh Renovations USA
item.description: The grand finale is here! Enter to win the final prize of the 2022 People’s Choice Awards
